    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ConfigurationApi getInstance(Context context)

      • registerConfigurationListener

        public void registerConfigurationListener(ConfigurationApi.Listener listener)
        Registers a new listener for all events which are sent by the configurationSdk. e.g.: Beacon scanned, Beacon configured... Also all errors, which are occurred, are sent.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener you want to register

      • unregisterConfigurationListener

        public void unregisterConfigurationListener(ConfigurationApi.Listener listener)
        Unregisters the given listener
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener you want to unregister

      • getAllKnownBatteryValues

        public void getAllKnownBatteryValues(<any> callback)
        Returns all known beaconStates to the callback
        Parameters:
        callback - callback which is called after all known beaconStates are loaded

      • clearBeacons

        public void clearBeacons()
        Deletes all known beaconStates.

      • setApiKey

        public void setApiKey(java.lang.String apiKey)
        This method sets the api-key, which gets verified by the server. Just with a valid api-key it is possible to communicate with our servers.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - the api-key which should be set.

      • setConfigurationMode

        public void setConfigurationMode(ConfigurationMode mode)
        !!!Attention: not implemented yet!!!
        Parameters:
        mode - the mode which should be used

        Sets the configuration-mode.

        ConfigurationMode.AUTO ConfigurationMode.AUTO means each uncrypted beacon, which is found, will be configured to be an cryptoBeacon automatically ConfigurationMode.MANUAL means you have to start the configuration by your own (startConfigurationOf(de.stroeer.configurationsdk.model.BeaconWithBattery))

      • startConfigurationOf

        !!!Attention: not implemented yet!!!
        Parameters:
